item.title: Automation Test Using Cypress Example
item.description: Prerequisites Install Cypress using NPM : 1 2 cd /your/project/path npm install cypress --save-dev or using Yarn : 1 2 cd /your/project/path yarn add cypress --dev Step to create test case Open cypress to get examples of test case from cypress module using npx : 1 npx cypress open using yarn 1 yarn run cypress open Cypress should be like image below Create test case data, in this case I will use my simple CRUP web app which is deployed on heroku https://github.
